author: Li Cohen
title: NYC's homeless face high risk from virus
description: Advocates say shelters are already over capacity, and those experiencing homelessness face a high risk of contracting the virus.
content: As the coronavirus rages through New York City, advocates are warning that the city's homeless population faces an even higher risk of contracting the disease than the rest of the city's residents. Local groups warn that the homeless don't have the option to … [+8338 chars]
